Package br.ufrn.imd.model

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.model.Ship
Direct Known Subclasses:
Corveta, Destroyer, Fragata, Submarino
public abstract class Ship extends Object
Represents a ship for the game "A Natalha Baval".
